executable.title: Encode DICOM Parametric Map
executable.description: Create itk image from DICOM Parametric Map Image object.

file.name: inputFileName
file.label: Parametric Map DICOM file name
file.description: File name of the parametric map image in a format readable by ITK (NRRD, NIfTI, MHD, etc.).

directory.name: outputDirName
directory.label: Output directory name
directory.description: Directory to store parametric map as NRRD file.
